articles.author: Ashley Killough and Ed Lavandera, CNN
articles.title: Hospitals in Texas border towns are fighting an explosion of post-holiday coronavirus cases
articles.description: Covid-19 cases have exploded along a stretch of the Texas-Mexico border, forcing daily transfers of coronavirus patients to bigger cities as hospitals in smaller communities fight to keep health systems from being overwhelmed.

articles.author: Jaide Timm-Garcia, Shasta Darlington and Alessandra Castelli, CNN Business
articles.title: Vale will pay nearly $7 billion over Brazilian dam collapse that killed 270 people
articles.description: Vale has agreed to pay 37.7 billion reais, or roughly $7 billion, to the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais, where a mining disaster in Brumadinho two years ago killed 270 people and caused massive environmental damage.

articles.title: This film festival has only one attendee. See what it is like
articles.description: This year, Sweden's Göteborg Film Festival has invited just one lucky film enthusiast to experience its 'Isolated Cinema' on a remote lighthouse island in Sweden.

articles.author: Radina Gigova and Stefano Pozzebon, CNN
articles.title: The healthcare workers watching from afar as rich countries begin vaccine rollout
articles.description: Colombian President Ivan Duque's government was lauded last year by the World Health Organization (WHO) for its swift and well-coordinated pandemic response.  But Colombia fell behind in the race to acquire vaccines.

articles.author: Mallika Kallingal, Sahar Akbarzai and Elizabeth Joseph, CNN
articles.title: Three New Jersey correctional officers charged after assault at a women's prison
articles.description: Three suspended correctional officers are facing criminal charges for their alleged role in an assault of inmates at a New Jersey women's prison.

articles.title: Snow and 'bone-chilling' temperatures expected in the UK this weekend
articles.description: Low pressure will bring more snow, ice, and cold temperatures for the United Kingdom this weekend. CNN meteorologist Derek Van Dam has the forecast.

articles.description: Hong Kong has introduced sweeping new restrictions for how schools operate, months after the Beijing government imposed a new national security law giving authorities wide-ranging powers to crack down on vaguely defined political crimes.

articles.author: Story by Reuters and CNN staff
articles.title: Guyana rolls back plan to open Taiwan office after Beijing criticizes 'mistake'
articles.description: Guyana abruptly terminated an agreement with Taiwan to open an office in the South American country on Thursday after China urged them to "correct their mistake."

articles.title: Trump wanted to keep focus on Antifa as right-wing extremism rose
articles.description: As the danger of violence from far-right groups grew over Donald Trump's term, the former President tried to keep the focus on Antifa. CNN's Alex Marquardt reports.

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: Kuaishou stock pops 160% in Hong Kong IPO
articles.description: Kuaishou's stock more than doubled in value Friday as the TikTok-like video app scored the world's biggest IPO since the coronavirus pandemic began.

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: School reopening becomes the new partisan wedge issue
articles.description: The debate over when and how and whether to put American kids back in is taking on a predictably partisan tinge in Washington, with Republicans targeting teachers' unions and Democrats over perceived resistance to reopening.
